title: Hi. Does anyone know how to power off a Pixel 4A 5G without using the screen (it's illegible)?
content: I'm trying to power off a 4a 5G with a broken unreadable screen.  I've tried holding the power button till black, then pressing volume down once, and power button once. per web random recomendation.  Currently the screen is unreadable and don't know what state the phone is in.
